projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: I made my own weather app that fetches real-time data from a weather API and dynamically updates the background to reflect day or night at the selected location.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive admin dashboard that integrates the Last.fm API to display my currently playing music alongside other dynamic content.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: A fully functional scientific calculator with support for advanced operations and a clean, intuitive interface.

projects.title: Library
projects.description: Simple library management app that lets users add, edit, and remove books, with data stored locally in the browser.

projects.title: Sign-up Form
projects.description: A responsive sign-up form with real-time validation and clean, modern styling.

projects.title: To-Do-List
projects.description: Task management app that lets users add, edit, and delete tasks, with data saved in local storage.

projects.title: Smiling Salads Restaurant
projects.description: Single-page restaurant website built to practice using Webpack and SPA development techniques.

projects.title: Noughts and Crosses
projects.description: The classic Tic-Tac-Toe (I speak British English!) game delivered in the browser with a simple and interactive interface.

projects.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
projects.description: A Pok√©mon-themed Rock, Paper, Scissors game with interactive gameplay and fun visuals.

projects.title: Etch-a-Sketch
projects.description: A browser-based Etch-a-Sketch game that lets users draw and erase using simple controls.
